      • getYearAsString

        public String getYearAsString()
        Description for this year. It is possible for Facebook to return either this value or getYear(). If getYear() returns null, then check this method to see if it has data, e.g. "1997".
        Returns:
        Description for this year.
        Since:
        1.7.1

      • setYearAsString

        Since:
        1.7.1
